# Use an official Node.js image
FROM node:16

# Install WebTorrent globally
RUN npm install -g webtorrent-cli

# Create a download directory
RUN mkdir /downloads

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /downloads

# Expose a port if you need to stream content (for example, 9000)
EXPOSE 9000

# The command to run WebTorrent in the container can be provided later
